pageContext.claim: “I recently had a terrific meeting with a bipartisan group of freshman lawmakers who feel very strongly in favor of Congressional term limits. I gave them my full support and endorsement for their efforts. #DrainTheSwamp”
pageContext.analysis: Our colleague Robert Costa reports that " term limits for congressional *staffers* was discussed by some lawmakers. But the idea was shelved when someone pointed out it wouldn't be best to make that a Constitutional amendment."
